thumb.title: 【PTCGL】あめ式ポケモンカード対戦♯3【ブイズバレット】
thumb.description: 次→気が向いたら日記です。6月18日はリーフィアの日らしい。Pokémon: 101 Sylveon ex PRE 411 Jolteon ex PRE 301 Umbreon ex PRE 602 Eevee ex PRE 751 Glaceon ex PRE 262 Leafeon ex PRE 61 Vaporeon ex PRE 231 Espeon ex PRE 342 Flareon ex PRE 144 Eevee PRE 74Trainer: 144 Buddy-Buddy Poffin PRE 1011 Area Zero Underdepths SCR 1314 Crispin SCR 1331 Iono PAL 1852 Cyrano SSP 1701 Night Stretcher SFA 612 Counter Catcher CIN 911 Super Rod PAL 1884 Professor's Research JTG 1552 Glass Trumpet PRE 1104 Pokégear 3.0 SVI 1861 Sparkling Crystal SCR 1424 Tera Orb SSP 1891 Boss's Orders PAL 172Energy: 34 Basic {W} Energy SVE 114 Basic {R} Energy SVE 104 Luminous Energy PAL 191Total Cards: 60
